description.full: To all the people who love to get down, DJ Hero速 2 is the ultimate party gaming experience. The introduction of Freestyle gameplay gives you the power to shape the soundtrack to your life, on over 75 unique mixes, flowing seamlessly between Hip-Hop, Electronica, Pop, Dance and more. Play solo, in Empire Mode速 or take this show on the road with online and offline DJ battle modes and group-friendly Party Play. DJ Hero速 2 will take you to the heart of the party... You can even bring along a guest vocalist or MC!
description.short: To all the people who love to get down, DJ Hero速 2 is the ultimate party gaming experience.
